item.description:
Did you want to be Robin Hood when you were a kid?  Have you ever dreamed of shooting arrows at your ex or bad boss? Well, the opportunity is here to learn a new skill.   

We are hosting an Archery event at Archery USA in Dedham.  The event is under the direction of a certified archery instructor and last 90 minutes.  It will includes a safety lecture, shooting demonstrations, and of course, bows, arrows and protective gear.  The cost is $15 per person.  Due to space limitation, the event will be limited to 17 people.   

Information on Archery USA can be found at www.archeryusa.com.

We will grab dinner in the area after the event.  Please indicate your interest on dinner with your RSVP.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Archery
